meanings.definition: Relating to the geographical distribution of plants.
meanings.sent1: The phytogeographically diverse forest showcased a wide variety of plant species.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the phytogeographically distinct regions to understand plant distribution.
meanings.sent3: The phytogeographically unique garden had flowers from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard was a phytogeographically rich tapestry of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The phytogeographically defined zones helped classify the plant species effectively.

meanings.definition: In a manner pertaining to the study of plant distribution in different regions.
meanings.sent1: The researchers phytogeographically analyzed the plant samples collected from various locations.
meanings.sent2: They traveled phytogeographically to study the plant distribution across continents.
meanings.sent3: The botanist phytogeographically explored the Amazon rainforest for new plant species.
meanings.sent4: The data was phytogeographically compared to draw conclusions about plant diversity.
meanings.sent5: She phytogeographically documented the changes in plant populations over time.
